interest_drivers: Introduction of PhariaAI, a full-stack generative AI suite
Four core components: PhariaAssistant, PhariaStudio, PhariaOS, and Pharia LLM
ai_analysis.summary: Aleph Alpha introduces PhariaAI, a comprehensive AI suite with various tools for knowledge workers, developers, and IT administrators, indicating notable technical advances and useful product updates.

changes.title: Welcome to the Aleph Alpha documentation! | Aleph Alpha Docs

Title: Welcome to the Aleph Alpha documentation! | Aleph Alpha Docs

Aleph Alpha Docs
PhariaAI
Verticals
Pharia LLM
APIs
Welcome
Glossary
About us
Release Notes
What's new
Welcome
Welcome to the Aleph Alpha documentation!

We are delighted to introduce you to PhariaAI, a full-stack generative AI suite designed to help you design and manage bespoke AI use cases. PhariaAI includes four core components:

PhariaAssistant assists knowledge workers to summarize text, extract information from documents, and to translate content. This app enhances productivity for knowledge work across teams. Read more...

PhariaStudio enables the development and deployment into production of organisation-specific AI solutions. This app provides a unified workspace where you can build, debug, fine-tune, and evaluate models and applications seamlessly. Read more...

PhariaOS manages access to AI resources, such as models and infrastructure. This app enables IT administrators and operations

ai_analysis.summary: Aleph Alpha introduces sovereign AI solutions for enterprises, focusing on PhariaAI technology and AI research innovation, enabling companies to build and retain their own competencies and protect their data and IP.

Aleph Alpha is driving change — Building a better AI future alongside you.
Sovereignty

Our mission is to secure your sovereignty. We enable you to build and retain your own competencies, protect your data and IP, run, change and scale operations without lock-in and empower you to master new knowledge work paradigms. Sovereignty in all layers is key to capture value in established and emerging markets.

Shape the future according to your values with PhariaAI.

Transparency & Co
